TableSettings.uniqueName: IdeConnections%23DB+test.tds.ie+Visitor-dev%2C+TrunkSELECT 'not_keys', ( SELECT JSON_ARRAYAGG(v) FROM ( WITH encrypted_values AS ( SELECT setting_name, safe_enc_toolkit.decrypt(setting_value) setting_value FROM safe_qr_configurations WHERE setting_name IN ( 'google_spreadsheet_developer_key', 'google_spreadsheet_client_id', 'google_spreadsheet_app_id' ) ) SELECT JSON_ARRAY(setting_name, setting_value) AS v FROM encrypted_values ) ) AS not_key_value FROM dual
